titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Georg Henrik von Wright, 29. 1. 1951
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der Trinity College Library; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (von Wright, S. 62).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Thanks for your letter. I have been rather ill for the last month, or so, & though I'd like to see you, it wouldn't be worth your while to come to Oxford. All the more as I shall, in all likelihood, come to Cambridge sometime next week. I'll stay with Dr Bevan & will let you know when I'm there. The last few days I've been feeling pretty good, but I still stay in bed for part of the day.
I'm looking forward to seeing you.
